about.title: About Our Mission
about.description: Yemenis In Exile is a podcast sharing stories of Yemenis around the world. Through intimate conversations and powerful narratives, we preserve the experiences, dreams, and resilience of our diaspora community. Our digital archive serves as a bridge connecting scattered voices and honoring the rich tapestry of Yemeni culture across borders.
